title: Enya: Moonshadows
creator_credit: M-Oceans Pictures, Warner Music UK and Michael Geoghegan
brief_description: This compilation of film clips is a must-see for Enya fans. The film clips add to the dreamy qualities inherent in Enya’s music style. Featuring some of her soundtracks made for film, the compilation includes: Orinoco Flow, Exile, Storm in Africa, Evening Falls, Caribbean Blue.
